omaha.neighborhoods: Downtown, Old Market, Dundee, Benson, Millwork District, Aksarben
omaha.meetingHighlights: Major Midwest recovery hub with diverse meetings throughout metro; strong Old Market presence; active young people community.
omaha.transitInfo: Metro Transit buses; Eppley Airfield (OMA); Missouri River location.

lincoln.neighborhoods: Downtown Lincoln, Near South, University of Nebraska area, Haymarket, West Lincoln
lincoln.meetingHighlights: State capital and college-town recovery; strong UNL student presence; diverse downtown and campus meetings.
lincoln.transitInfo: StarTran bus service; Lincoln Airport (LNK); state capital location.

grand-island.neighborhoods: Downtown Grand Island, South Locust, North Road, Westridge
grand-island.meetingHighlights: Central Nebraska recovery hub; railroad heritage community; diverse bilingual meetings serving agricultural area.
grand-island.transitInfo: GI Transit bus service; Central Nebraska Regional Airport (GRI); I-80 corridor.
